org.apache.logging.log4j.message

类 FormattedMessageFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.message.AbstractMessageFactory
      • org.apache.logging.log4j.message.FormattedMessageFactory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, MessageFactory, MessageFactory2

    public class FormattedMessageFactory
extends AbstractMessageFactory
    Creates FormattedMessage instances for MessageFactory2 methods (and MessageFactory by extension.)

    Note to implementors

    This class implements all MessageFactory2 methods.

    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      FormattedMessageFactory()
      Constructs a message factory with default flow strings.

    • 方法详细资料

      • newMessage

        public Message newMessage(String message,
                          Object... params)
        Creates StringFormattedMessage instances.
        参数:
        message - The message format.
        params - Message parameters.
        返回:
        The Message object.
        另请参阅:
        MessageFactory.newMessage(String, Object...)

        public Message newMessage(String message,
                          Object p0)

        覆盖:
